name: Eberhard Muller's Cucumber and Apple Salad
keywords: apple, carrot, cucumber, raw, vegan, vegetarian, summer
recipeIngredient: 2 medium carrots, peeled and julienned or very thinly sliced
1 green apple, washed and julienned or very thinly sliced
1 large or 2 small cloves garlic, minced
1 or 2 jalapenos or other hot peppers, minced, or 1/2 tablespoon hot pepper flakes, or to taste
Salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Cut the cucumber in half. Use a spoon to scoop out the seeds; discard them. Julienne or thinly slice the cucumber, then combine with the carrots, apple, garlic, peppers and cilantro.
Toss with the vinegar, then add salt and pepper.
